resources.string: Do you want to feed cat?

Hey. We application helps owners to balance the diet of Pets. We do not aim to tell you how much and how often to feed your pet. Each feed manufacturer specifies how much feed the animal needs at your weight and age. We know that you want to follow the regime of your pet and watch how much food he consumes. And FatCat will help you with that.
Is you pet already exist and your system and you additional pet owner?
Please write down your email, we have to check something.
Please login and we can move on
